text: Haßberge is a Landkreis (district) in Bavaria, Germany. The district was made in 1972 by merging the districts of Haßfurt, Ebern and Hofheim. ==Towns and municipalities== Towns Municipalities #Ebern #Eltmann #Haßfurt #Hofheim #Königsberg #Zeil am Main #Aidhausen #Breitbrunn #Bundorf #Burgpreppach #Ebelsbach #Ermershausen #Gädheim #Kirchlauter #Knetzgau #Maroldsweisach 11.
